topic.title: Zeromail
topic.body: What is zeromail owner's contact info?

topic.title: ZeroMail (Second part)
topic.body: When you receive mail from a user by using zeromail,then you see the user you sent to "added" under "sent". How do I remove users from that list that shows under "Sent"?

1579803165_13HeCqSo3hr5Ady7E3fv17FQ8Pyi1.body: When you receive mail from a user by using zeromail,then you see the user you sent to "added" under "sent". How do I remove users from that list that shows under "Sent"?

1579818870_13HeCqSo3hr5Ady7E3fv17FQ8Pyi1.body: There is no "trash" in Zeromail unless theres a file in zeromails folder of Zeronet that I can remove.. but other than that i dont think so. but ofcourse I havent tried yet

Try send me a email to let me test the deletion of the user from userlist on the right side of ZeroMail under "Sent". You can find my zeromail by highlighting my user/nick on here. (only 1 user can send to test).

> [driud](#comment_32_18yZKKFySP5bvmNy14T9vgj3H99AC1PQkH): Witam; ja piszę przy pomocy tłumacza.Nie wszystko może być dobrze zrozumiane.Poczta ma pojemność,48K- jest to mała pojemność.Dlatego trzeba ją ciągle czyścić.Czy o to tobie chodziło?Czy chodziło o usunięcie adresu nicku ze spisu adresowego..Hello; I write with the help of an interpreter.Not everything can be understood well.The post office has a capacity of 48K - it is a small capacity.That's why you need to clean it constantly.Was that what you meant?Was it about removing the nickname from the address book.

When you send someone a email using zeromail,it creates something called "Contacts" with the name of the sender under "Contacts".. How do I remove that?

> [rannulfr](#comment_15_17ThiaUZmUKD2nEKkvUN6iCvaa1F3GBY51): why?

Why? because it will get full under "Contacts" and I want to clean it up
